snippet: Evidence found at a ranch for troubled youths corroborates abuse allegations by students, Gov. Susana Martinez said in defending the state’s investigation into the program.
abstract: New Mexico Gov Susana Martinez says evidence found at ranch for troubled youths corroborates allegations of abuse from students.
lead_paragraph: Evidence found at a ranch for troubled youths corroborates abuse allegations by students, Gov. Susana Martinez said in defending the state’s investigation into the program.

headline.main: New Mexico: Governor Backs Alert on Youth Camp
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Governor Backs Alert On Youth Camp
